data.actual_result: The latest message in the channel is the one you saw before you lost access until you reload your client
data.expected_result: You should see all messages you've missed in the channel while you didn't have access to the channel after you regain access.
data.short_description: You can't see new messages in channels you previously had access to once you regain access to said channel until you reload your client
data.steps_to_repro: - Have access in a channel - Have someone remove your access from said channel - Get the other person to type new messages in said channel - Trick them into giving you access to the channel again - Observe
